member.name: T:ImprovedInput.CustomInput
member.summary: One tick of input for a given player.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInput.GetRawInput(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all modded input for the given at this time.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.CustomInput.AnyPressed
member.summary: Gets if any key is pressed.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.CustomInput.Item(ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind)
member.summary: Gets or sets whether is active.
member.returns: True if the key is active.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInput.Apply(System.Func{ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets or sets whether any key is active by applying the function to all of them.
member.remarks: This is primarily useful if you want to conditionally enable or disable all inputs, like in vanilla when the player is using their map.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInput.Clone
member.summary: Deeply copies .

member.name: T:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt
member.summary: Extends the functionality of the vanilla input system.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.HistoryLength
member.summary: Determines how many ticks of input are stored for and .
member.remarks: This value starts at 10 and can only be increased. Set it when your mod is being enabled. Avoid setting this to anything extremely high.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.UsingKeyboard(Options.ControlSetup)
member.summary: Returns true if a given control setup uses a keyboard.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.UsingGamepad(Options.ControlSetup)
member.summary: Returns true if a given control setup uses a gamepad.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.UsingKeyboard(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if a given player is using a keyboard.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.UsingGamepad(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if a given player is using a gamepad.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.IsKeyBound(Player,ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind)
member.summary: Checks if is bound for .
member.returns: True if the key is bound.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.IsKeyUnbound(Player,ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind)
member.summary: Checks if is unbound for .
member.returns: True if the key is unbound.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.IsPressed(Player,ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind)
member.summary: Checks if is being pressed by .
member.returns: True if the key is down.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.JustPressed(Player,ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind)
member.summary: Checks if is just now being pressed by .
member.returns: True if the key is down, but was not down last tick.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.Input(Player)
member.summary: Gets all custom input for this tick.
member.remarks: Ignores keypresses made while unconscious, using the map, or being controlled. To use those keypresses, see .

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.RawInput(Player)
member.summary: Gets all custom input for this tick, including suppressed inputs. Avoid modifying anything here.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.InputHistory(Player)
member.summary: Gets all custom input for in recent history.
member.remarks: Ignores keypresses made while unconscious, using the map, or being controlled. To use those keypresses, see .

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.CustomInputExt.RawInputHistory(Player)
member.summary: Gets all custom input for in recent history, including suppressed inputs. Avoid modifying anything here.

member.name: T:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind
member.summary: A simple per-player keybind.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Keybinds
member.summary: Every keybind currently registered, including vanilla and modded keybinds.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Pause
member.summary: The PAUSE button. Usually ignored for anyone but the first player.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Map
member.summary: The MAP button.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Grab
member.summary: The GRAB button.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Jump
member.summary: The JUMP button.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Throw
member.summary: The THROW button.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Up
member.summary: The UP button. Ignored for controllers.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Left
member.summary: The UP button. Ignored for controllers.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Down
member.summary: The UP button. Ignored for controllers.

member.name: F:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Right
member.summary: The UP button. Ignored for controllers.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Register(System.String,System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.KeyCode,UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary: Registers a new keybind.
member.param: The unique ID for the keybind.
The display name of the mod that registered this keybind.
A short name to show in the Input Settings screen.
member.returns: A new to be used like player.JustPressed(keybind).
member.exception: The is invalid or already taken.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Register(System.String,System.String,System.String,UnityEngine.KeyCode,UnityEngine.KeyCode,UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary: Registers a new keybind.
member.param: The unique ID for the keybind.
The display name of the mod that registered this keybind.
A short name to show in the Input Settings screen.
The default value for PlayStation, Switch Pro, and other controllers.
The default value for Xbox controllers.
member.returns: A new to be used like player.JustPressed(keybind).
member.exception: The is invalid or already taken.

member.name: M:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a keybind given its .
member.returns: The keybind, or if none was found.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Id
member.summary: A unique ID.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Mod
member.summary: The display name of the mod that registered this keybind.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Name
member.summary: The display name of the keybind.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.KeyboardPreset
member.summary: The default value for keyboards.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.GamepadPreset
member.summary: The default value for PlayStation, Switch Pro, and other controllers.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.XboxPreset
member.summary: The default value for Xbox controllers.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.Description
member.summary: A longer description to show at the bottom of the screen when configuring the keybind.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.MapSuppressed
member.summary: If true, using the map suppresses the keybind.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.SleepSuppressed
member.summary: If true, sleeping suppresses the keybind.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.HideConfig
member.summary: If true, the keybind will not be configurable through the Input Settings screen.

member.name: P:ImprovedInput.PlayerKeybind.HideConflict
member.summary: If true, the conflict warning will be hidden when this key conflicts with the given key.
